auth.sessionExpired: Your session expired. Please log in again to continue.
auth.signInPrompt: Sign in to start capturing products
extraction.noData: Could not extract product data from this page. Try a different product page.
extraction.blocked: Could not access the product page. The website may block automated access.
extraction.limitReached: Monthly AI extraction limit reached. Upgrade your plan for more extractions.
product.name: Product Name
image.noImages: No images found on this page.
document.label: Document
error.network: Connection failed. Please check your network and try again.
error.tabGone: The selected tab no longer exists. Please select the document again to refresh its tabs.
error.docNotFound: The document could not be found. Please refresh and try again.
error.addFailed: Failed to add product to document.
error.boundaryDetail: An unexpected error occurred in the Rerum extension.
onboarding.step1Desc: Navigate to any product page on the web (e.g., Amazon, Wayfair, or any online store).
onboarding.step2Desc: Select the estimate document where the product data should be added. The AI will extract columns configured for that document.
onboarding.step3Desc: Click "Extract Product Data" and our AI will fill in the document's columns. Review the data, then click "Add to Estimate".
action.selectDocumentFirst: Select a document to extract data
